@human_name.description: Human readable name of the application

app.name: matrix-authentication-service
app.technical_description: OpenID Connect discovery document: %(discovery_url)s

@technical_description.description: Introduction text displayed on the home page

privacy_policy.alt: Link to the service privacy policy

terms_and_conditions.alt: Link to the service terms and conditions

@unexpected.description: Error message displayed when an unexpected error occurs

deactivated.description: This account (%(mxid)s) has been deleted. If this is not expected, contact your server administrator.
deactivated.heading: Account deleted

locked.description: This account (%(mxid)s) has been locked. If this is not expected, contact your server administrator.
locked.heading: Account locked

logged_out.description: This session has been terminated. Sign out to be able to log back in
logged_out.heading: Session terminated

captcha.noscript: This form is protected by a CAPTCHA and requires JavaScript to be enabled to submit it. Please enable JavaScript in your browser and reload this page.

@change.description: Button to change the user's password

@confirm.description: Confirmation field for the new password

@current.description: Field for the user's current password

change_password.description: This will change the password on your account.
change_password.heading: Change my password

@heading.description: Heading on the change password page

@new.description: Field for the user's new password

choose_display_name.description: This is the name other people will see. You can change this at any time.

@description.description: During the registration flow, the user is asked to choose a display name. This is the description of that form.

choose_display_name.headline: Choose your display name

@headline.description: During the registration flow, the user is asked to choose a display name. This is the headline of that form.

consent.client_wants_access: %(client_name)s at %(redirect_uri)s wants to access your account.
consent.heading: Allow access to your account?
consent.you_may_be_sharing: You may be sharing sensitive information with this site or app.

device_code_link.headline: Enter the code displayed on your device

device_consent.another_device_access: Another device wants to access your account.

denied.description: You denied access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
denied.heading: Access denied

granted.description: You granted access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
granted.heading: Access granted

@client_on_device.description: The automatic device name generated for a client, e.g. 'Element on iPhone'

@name_for_platform.description: Part of the automatic device name for the platfom, e.g. 'Safari for macOS'

email_in_use.description: If you have forgotten your account credentials, you can recover your account. You can also start over and use a different email address.
email_in_use.title: The email address %(email)s is already in use

@greeting.description: Greeting at the top of emails sent to the user

recovery.click_button: Click on the button below to create a new password:
recovery.copy_link: Copy the following link and paste it into a browser to create a new password:
recovery.fallback: The button doesn't work for you?
recovery.headline: You requested a password reset for your %(server_name)s account.
recovery.subject: Reset your account password (%(mxid)s)
recovery.you_can_ignore: If you didn't ask for a new password, you can ignore this email. Your current password will continue to work.

verify.body_html: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s

@body_html.description: The body of the email sent to verify an email address (HTML)

verify.body_text: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s

@body_text.description: The body of the email sent to verify an email address (text)

verify.subject: Your email verification code is: %(code)s

@subject.description: The subject line of the email sent to verify an email address

errors.captcha: CAPTCHA verification failed, please try again
errors.email_banned: Email is banned by the server policy
errors.email_domain_banned: Email domain is banned by the server policy
errors.email_domain_not_allowed: Email domain is not allowed by the server policy
errors.email_not_allowed: Email is not allowed by the server policy
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: You've made too many requests in a short period. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
errors.username_all_numeric: Username cannot consist solely of numbers
errors.username_banned: Username is banned by the server policy

@username_banned.description: Error message shown on registration, when the username matches a pattern that is banned by the server policy.

errors.username_invalid_chars: Username contains invalid characters. Use lowercase letters, numbers, dashes and underscores only.
errors.username_not_allowed: Username is not allowed by the server policy

@username_not_allowed.description: Error message shown on registration, when the username *does not match* any of the patterns that are allowed by the server policy.

@continue_with_provider.description: Button to log in with an upstream provider

@forgot_password.description: On the login page, link to the account recovery process

@signed_in_as.description: Displayed in the navbar when the user is signed in

not_found.description: The page you were looking for doesn't exist or has been moved
not_found.heading: Page not found

@not_you.description: Suggestions for the user to log in as a different user

policy_violation.description: This might be because of the client which authored the request, the currently logged in user, or the request itself.

@description.description: Displayed when an authorization request is denied by the policy

policy_violation.heading: The authorization request was denied by the policy enforced by this service

@heading.description: Displayed when an authorization request is denied by the policy

consumed.description: To create a new password, start over and select “Forgot password”.

@description.description: Description on the error page shown when a user tries to use a recovery link that has already been used

consumed.heading: The link to reset your password has already been used

@heading.description: Title on the error page shown when a user tries to use a recovery link that has already been used

disabled.description: If you have lost your credentials, please contact the administrator to recover your account.
disabled.heading: Account recovery is disabled

expired.description: Request a new email that will be sent to: %(email)s.

@description.description: Description on the page shown when a user tries to use an expired recovery link

expired.heading: The link to reset your password has expired

@heading.description: Title on the page shown when a user tries to use an expired recovery link

@confirm.description: Label for the password confirmation field

finish.description: Choose a new password for your account.

@description.description: Description for the final password recovery page

finish.heading: Reset your password

@heading.description: Heading for the final password recovery page

@new.description: Label for the new password field

@save_and_continue.description: Button to save the new password and continue

@change_email.description: Button to change the email address for the password recovery link

progress.description: We sent an email with a link to reset your password if there's an account using %(email)s.

@description.description: The description of the password recovery page, informing the user that an email has been sent to reset their password

progress.heading: Check your email

@heading.description: The title of the password recovery page, informing the user that an email has been sent to reset their password

@resend_email.description: Button to resend the email with the password recovery link

start.description: An email will be sent with a link to reset your password.

@description.description: The description of the page to initiate an account recovery

start.heading: Enter your email to continue

@heading.description: The title of the page to initiate an account recovery

@call_to_login.description: Displayed on the registration page to suggest to log in instead

register.terms_of_service: I agree to the Terms and Conditions

registration_token.description: Enter a registration token provided by the homeserver administrator.
registration_token.headline: Registration token

scope.edit_profile: Edit your profile and contact details

@edit_profile.description: Displayed when the 'urn:mas:graphql:*' scope is requested

@manage_sessions.description: Displayed when the 'urn:mas:graphql:*' scope is requested

scope.mas_admin: Administer any user on the matrix-authentication-service

@mas_admin.description: Displayed when the 'urn:mas:admin' scope is requested

scope.send_messages: Send new messages on your behalf

@synapse_admin.description: Displayed when the 'urn:synapse:admin:*' scope is requested

scope.view_messages: View your existing messages and data

@view_messages.description: Displayed when the 'urn:matrix:client:api:*' scope is requested

scope.view_profile: See your profile info and contact details

@view_profile.description: Displayed when the 'openid' scope is requested

link_mismatch.heading: This upstream account is already linked to another account.

@heading.description: Page shown when the user tries to link an upstream account that is already linked to another account

login_link.description: An account exists for this username (%(username)s), it will be linked to this upstream account.
login_link.heading: Link to your existing account

@heading.description: Displayed when creating a new account from an SSO login, and the username is not forced

@create_account.description: Displayed when creating a new account from an SSO login, and the username is pre-filled and forced

register.forced_display_name: Will use the following display name

@forced_display_name.description: Tells the user what display name will be imported

register.forced_email: Will use the following email address

@forced_email.description: Tells the user which email address will be imported

@forced_localpart.description: Tells the user which username will be used

import_data.description: Confirm the information that will be linked to your new %(server_name)s account.
import_data.heading: Import your data

@link_existing.description: Button to link an existing account after an SSO login

signup_with_upstream.heading: Continue signing up with your %(human_name)s account

@suggested_display_name.description: Option to let the user import their display name after an SSO login

@suggested_email.description: Option to let the user import their email address after an SSO login
